title: George Stonestreet
text:
George Albert Stonestreet (1915-1993) was an Australian <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1930s and 1940s.
A prospect from the <a href="Newtown%20Jets">Newtown</a> junior league, Stonestreet was graded in 1937 and rose through the ranks rapidly and had his first grade debut for <a href="Newtown%20Jets">Newtown</a> on 19 June 1937. He retired at the end of the 1943 season.
Stonestreet died on 24 July 1993 at <a href="Umina%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Umina, New South Wales</a>.
